PAD_DoorSpotted.synopsis: The player discovers a door to the hideout where an Aasimar Harper had survived longer than most would in the curse.

PAD_TrapSpotted.synopsis: The player spots the trap in the aasimar survivor booster.
PAD_TrapSpotted.how_to_trigger: Approach 107.235; 7.23; -862.99 in SCL_Main and pass or fail the passive perception check.

PAD_DoorSpotted_0.speaker: Player
PAD_DoorSpotted_0.text: Strange - the dust on the leftmost door has been wiped clean.

PAD_TrapSpotted_1.speaker: Player
PAD_TrapSpotted_1.text: |Some runes on the floor over there.|
